executable.title: Atlas Computation (TubeTK)
executable.description: Computes an atlas from a set of subject-specific files.
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the TubeTK project at Kitware.

file.name: imageDocFile
file.label: Image Document File
file.description: Object document with Euclidean distance map information.

image.name: outputMeanAtlas
image.label: Output (Mean) Atlas Image
image.description: Output (mean) atlas computed from subject-specific files.

image.name: outputVarianceAtlas
image.label: Output (Variance) Atlas Image
image.description: Output (variance) atlas computed from subject-specific files.

image.name: outputCountImage
image.label: Output Count Image
image.description: Filename to save the count image.

boolean.name: doImageSizeAdjustment
boolean.label: Do Image Size Adjustment
boolean.description: Adjust the mean size to the input images.

boolean.name: doImageOriginAdjustment
boolean.label: Do Image Origin Adjustment
boolean.description: Adjust the mean origin to the input images.

boolean.name: useStdDeviation
boolean.label: Use Standard Deviation
boolean.description: Is the sigma image standard deviation?

integer.name: lowerThreshold
integer.label: Lower Threshold
integer.description: Minimum number of contributing images for pixel to be counted in output.

double-vector.name: outputSize
double-vector.label: Output Size
double-vector.description: Output image size (X,Y,Z). Cannot use with --doImageSizeAdjustment.

integer-vector.name: outputSpacing
integer-vector.label: Output Spacing
integer-vector.description: Output image spacing. Default is the initial image spacing.
